name: RUNNERSPIRE
description:
RUNNERSPIRE My first game that i made!Play it when you are bored  Runnn to infinityyy and beyooond!!! Dash around the obstacles and collect coins and dont die. In your way you will find power ups.Collect them they will be CONTROLS Press A,D or Left,Right_Arrow = Turn Space Bar = Jump S = Down/Force landing  while jumping MOREEEE SCREEENSHOOTS!

!Give your feedback so we can improve the quality of the game!

moreee updatess coming soooon.
